attachments.pretext: You can use following messages for vmcjp app.

fields.title: Register VMC's API token
fields.value: Type `register token` to register VMC JP SET org's API token. This token will stored in this system db. You need to register your token at first if you want to use this slack app.

fields.title: Delete VMC's API token
fields.value: Type `delete token` to delete token stored in this system db.

fields.title: Create SDDC
fields.value: Type `create sddc` to create sddc on VMC JP SET org. You can create single or multi host sddc.

attachments.pretext: You can use following messages for vmcjp app.

fields.title: List SDDCs
fields.value: Type `list sddcs` to list sddc which deployed on VMC JP SET org.
